data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Oliver, Paul M., Günther, Rainer, Richards, Stephen J. (2019): Systematics of New Guinea treefrogs (Litoria: Pelodryadidae) with erectile rostral spikes: an extended description of Litoria pronimia and a new species from the Foja Mountains. Zootaxa 4604 (2): 335-348, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4604.2.6|6 occurrences
